name: PlaygroundRemoteLiveViewProxyDelegate
desc: A delegate you use to receive messages from the always-on live view.

items.name: func remoteLiveViewProxy(PlaygroundRemoteLiveViewProxy, received: PlaygroundValue)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a message was received from the always-on live view.

items.name: func remoteLiveViewProxyConnectionClosed(PlaygroundRemoteLiveViewProxy)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that it has disconnected from the always-on live view.
